Package ch.idsia.crema.factor

Class FactorUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.idsia.crema.factor.FactorUtil
  • public class FactorUtil
extends Object
    A utility class with function to help with factors. These methods are not part of the Factor API to avoid clogging.
    Author:
    david

      • filter

        public static <F extends OperableFactor<F>> F filter​(F factor,
                                                     F indicator)

        An alternative take on filtering some rows out of a factor. Note that factors do implement filter, but there is debate whether this is correct.

        The indicator is used as we cannot create and indicator factor without knowing the actual data type (F is generic).

        Parameters:
        factor -
        indicator -
        Returns:
